title: A Closer Look: Trump/Nunes Story Gets Weirder | Craig Ferguson | George Saunders
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Trump's record low approval rating and the GOP's plan to allow Internet companies to sell people's Internet data.
Then, Seth talks to comedian Craig Ferguson and author George Saunders, both of whom have more to say backstage at Studio 8G.
